title: SpaceX Sells Bitcoin Holdings (Report)
verbatim_text:
SpaceX wrote down the value of bitcoin it owns by a total of $373 million last year and in 2021 and has sold the cryptocurrency. Tesla has taken a similar approach with its bitcoin holdings. 

The report triggered a massive liquidation cascade across the crypto market.
notes: Caused 10% flash crash. Z-Score 9.3 (Spike at Aug 18 07:00 is likely the Asian follow-through or the main event depending on timezone)

title: BlackRock iShares Bitcoin Trust Listed on DTCC
verbatim_text:
The iShares Bitcoin Trust has been listed on the DTCC (Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation) with ticker IBTC. 

This is a critical step in the ETF approval process, signaling imminent launch readiness.
